tasks.task: Construct and maintain a rainwater collection system for a greenhouse.
subtasks: Anchor gutters to a Quonset hut structure.
Redirect rainfall from the gutter into a trough using a T-fitting.
Install a first flush diverter to filter initial runoff.
Transfer collected water to a sump filter using a pump.
Transfer filtered water to an opaque reservoir.
Distribute collected water to a greenhouse reservoir via a jet pump.
Adjust water sources in the greenhouse between early spring and warm weather.

tasks.task: Operate a seedling greenhouse using rainwater.
subtasks: Monitor and utilize rainwater supply for healthy seedling growth.
Address substrate health issues in tomatoes and peppers due to salinity.

tasks.task: Maintain a system for overhead irrigation (flying festoon).
subtasks: Operate and demonstrate the overhead irrigation setup.
